game.name: Tribal Towers - Siege of the Shifting Fortress
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fight through the shifting tower, loot powerful gear and gain new skills. Challenge bosses and free your villagers to revive your town in this Action-RPG. The tower will change, but the fountains' magic will save your progress until you face the bosses and the wizard himself.
